Translations.Text: Among believers there bol ludia fulfill ich zavazok GOD Some z them umrel chvila others stand ready never wavering
GOD will ISTE recompense truthful for ICH truthfulness punish hypocrites if He wills redeem them! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
GOD repulsed those disbelieved ICH ZURIVOST they LAVY empty-handed! GOD thus REZERVNY believers any boj GOD bol MOCNY Almighty
He i brought ich allies among the ludia scripture ich zaistit positions threw terror into ich srdce! Some z them ona killed some ona pocas zajatec
He robit ona zdedit ich zem ich domov ich peniaze zem ona never stepped on! GOD bol full control all things
O prophet say do tvoj manzelka ona seeking this zivot its vanities potom let mna compensate ona allow ona ist amicably
if ona seeking GOD Jeho posol abode Hereafter potom GOD chystat righteous ona velka recompense
O manzelka prophet if any z ona commits gross zhresit retribution zdvojnasobit ju! This bol easy GOD robit
